judges: Before McCollum, Mitchell, Fell, Brown and Mestrezat, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Mestrezat,
Fot' tbe reasons given in tbe opinion this day filed in the case of Robert W. Finletter, etc., v. Katharine P. Appleton et al. at No. 374, January term, 1899, the assignment of error in this case is overruled, and the decree is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Mestrezat,

casebody.head_matter:
Finletter v. Perot.
Argued Jan. 22, 1900.
Appeal, No. 876, Jan. T., 1899, by plaintiff, from decree of C. P. No. 1, Phila. Co., Sept. T., 1897, No. 733, dismissing bill in equity in case of Robert W. Finletter, Receiver of tbe Acetylene Light, Heat & Power Company, v. William S. Perot, Jr.
Before McCollum, Mitchell, Fell, Brown and Mestrezat, JJ.
Affirmed.
April 16, 1900:
